FAQ
===

**Q1**: "What technologies does PhishGuard use?"
- **A1**: "It uses Google Speech-to-Text API and OpenAI GPT models to analyze voice data in real-time."

**Q2**: "Is this program free?"
- **A2**: "The project itself is free, but additional costs may arise from using Google Cloud and OpenAI APIs."

**Q3**: "How accurate is voice phishing detection?"
- **A3**: "Accuracy depends on the quality of training data and Google STT, currently achieving over 90% accuracy."

**Q4**: "Is my data safe?"
- **A4**: "All data is deleted immediately after analysis."

**Q5**: "What data is stored?"
- **A5**: "User voice data is deleted post-analysis, and no additional data is stored."
